name: Pomegranate and Ginger Sparkler
description: I have three criteria for a tasty party drink: it has to be delicious, lovely to look at, and easy to make. That's where sparkling wine comes in, jazzed up with a bit of pomegranate juice and some ginger liqueur.
recipeIngredient: 1 ounce ginger liqueur such as Domaine de Canton

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the pomegranate juice and ginger liqueur in a champagne flute. Pour sparkling wine over top. Garnish rim with a piece of candied ginger.
To make ahead of time: combine 8 ounces pomegranate juice with 8 ounces ginger liqueur. This will make enough for to be paired with 1 bottle of sparkling wine.
